app.description: CardDAV is a protocol that allows different clients/servers to access contact information on remote servers. It extends WebDAV specification and uses vCard format for the data. This app allows you to access your customer list via CardDAV protocol.

statusText.successfullySetUp: CardDAV server is ready. Access your contacts at the provided URL.
statusText.connectionFailed: Failed to set up CardDAV server

form.info: After enabling, you can access your customer list via CardDAV at: <url></url>
